name: WoodSpells
description:
WoodSpells is a game developed for the Cozy autumn(2022) gamejam, made in 2 weeks by d!P(programmer), Mentos(artist), Pablovamil(musician).
It's a cozy foraging game there you cast spells to destroy trees, stones and grass to gain resources to win the game.

Controls: WASD to move, left mouse button to cast spells

Have fun!
